actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to train certain veterans, with appropriate experience as paramedical personnel, to serve as medical assistants in long-term health care facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to enable the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to schools of medicine to assist in developing and conducting training programs designed to prepare Armed Forces veterans, with appropriate experience as paramedical personnel, to serve as medical assistants in long-term health care facilities. Authorizes appropriations of $2,500,000 for fiscal year 1976 and $5,000,000 for each of the next three fiscal years to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to train certain veterans, with appropriate experience as paramedical personnel, to serve as medical assistants in long-term health care facilities.
